#summary Steps to go through for a release
#labels Phase-Support,Phase-Implementation

= Change src version numbers =

 * in {{{simal-sintall/simal-install.xml}}} change {{{<appversion>x.y.z[-POSTFIX]</appversion>}}} to the correct version number (usually this will mean changing the postfix from "-dev" to "-rc1", "-rc2", "rc3" etc.)

= Build the release candidate installer =

*FIXME:* Note that this is not working yet, this page documents the process as it is intended to be.

 * run {{{ant build}}} in the {{{simal-sintall/simal-install.xml}}}

= Upload to Google Code =

Upload to the downloads section of Google Code, making the release candidate a featured download

= Test =

 * notify users/developers of new release candidate
 * as many people as possible should test the release candidate

= Change src version numbers =

 * in {{{simal-sintall/simal-install.xml}}} change {{{<appversion>x.y.z[-POSTFIX]</appversion>}}} to the correct version number (usually this will mean removing the postfix)

= Package for release =

 * run {{{ant build}}} in the {{{simal-sintall/simal-install.xml}}}

= Upload to Google Code =

Upload to the downloads section of Google Code, making the release candidate a featured download

= Change src version numbers =

 * in {{{simal-sintall/simal-install.xml}}} change {{{<appversion>x.y.z[-POSTFIX]</appversion>}}} to the correct version number (usually this will be the next minor version number with the postfix "-dev")
